# Stage: Constants

```{r}
#| label: setup

source(here::here("data-raw", "R", "setup.R"))

```


```{r}
#| eval: true

fpath <- fs::path(DIRS$work, "tests_constants_assumptions.csv")
status <- readr::read_csv(fpath)

if (status$passed) {
  fname <- "constants_assumptions.rds"
  file_copy(
    fs::path(DIRS$work, fname),
    fs::path(DIRS$stage, fname),
    overwrite = TRUE
  )
} else {
  stop("constants_assumptions failure")
}

```
